Source code for mc.utils.artifact_processors.base_artifact_processor

import abc



[docs]class BaseArtifactProcessor(abc.ABC):
    """Abstract base class for artifact processors."""

    ARTIFACT_TYPE = None


[docs]    class InvalidArtifactError(Exception): pass



[docs]    @abc.abstractmethod
    def dir_to_artifact(self, dir=None, **kwargs):
        raise NotImplementedError

    def artifact_to_dir(self, artifact=None, dest=None, **kwargs):
        raise NotImplementedError
